name: Velvet Whisper Wand
shortDescription: A soft, body-safe wand designed for gentle, customizable relaxation.
description: The Velvet Whisper Wand offers a luxurious experience with its silky-soft silicone exterior and multiple intensity settings. Perfect for those beginning their journey, this rechargeable wand provides gentle yet effective sensations. Water-resistant design makes cleanup simple, and the elegant aesthetic fits beautifully on any nightstand.
careNotes: Clean with mild soap and water or toy cleaner. Store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight.

name: After Hours Pulse
shortDescription: Bold, intense, and beautifully engineered for those who know what they want.
description: The After Hours Pulse delivers powerful, targeted sensations with precision engineering. Features advanced pulsation patterns, a premium metallic finish, and intelligent pressure sensors. Designed for experienced users seeking sophisticated intensity.
careNotes: Clean thoroughly after each use with toy cleaner. USB-C charging only. Do not submerge charging port.

name: Soft Focus Mini Massager
shortDescription: Discreet, portable, and perfect for gentle exploration.
description: Our bestselling mini massager combines portability with power. Whisper-quiet operation and elegant design make this the perfect travel companion. Three simple modes offer approachable intensity for those new to intimate products.
careNotes: Clean with mild soap and warm water. Battery-operated, replace AAA battery as needed.

name: Midnight Signal Rechargeable Wand
shortDescription: Sophisticated power wrapped in darkness. For those who demand excellence.
description: The Midnight Signal represents the pinnacle of intimate design. Featuring intelligent heating technology, customizable pulsation patterns, and a stunning matte black finish with gold accents. This is luxury redefined for the experienced connoisseur.
careNotes: Use only premium silicone-safe cleaner. Charge with included magnetic cable. Store in provided luxury case.

name: Barely Proper Lace Bodysuit
shortDescription: Delicate French lace meets playful elegance.
description: This stunning bodysuit features intricate French lace, adjustable straps, and a flattering silhouette. Soft against the skin with just enough structure to feel confident and alluring. Available in multiple sizes with inclusive fit options.
careNotes: Hand wash only in cold water. Lay flat to dry. Do not bleach or iron.

name: Noir Siren Satin Slip
shortDescription: Pure silk with gold hardware. Seduction in its simplest form.
description: Crafted from 100% pure mulberry silk with 24k gold-plated adjustable chains. The Noir Siren Slip drapes beautifully, skimming curves with effortless sophistication. Deep V-neckline and delicate lace trim at the hem create an unforgettable silhouette.
careNotes: Dry clean only or hand wash in cold water with silk detergent. Never wring or twist. Roll in towel to remove excess moisture.

name: Pretty Ruthless Strappy Set
shortDescription: Bold straps, daring cutouts, and unapologetic confidence.
description: This architectural lingerie set features intricate strapping details, strategic cutouts, and a bold silhouette. Crafted from high-quality elastic and hardware designed to make a statement. Includes bralette and matching high-waist bottom.
careNotes: Hand wash in cold water. Fasten all closures before washing. Air dry only.

name: Femme Obscura Mesh Panel Bodysuit
shortDescription: Dark, daring, and designed to captivate.
description: Sheer mesh panels meet structured boning in this show-stopping bodysuit. Features include a plunging neckline, strategic opacity, and luxe satin details. This piece is for those who embrace their power with elegance and edge.
careNotes: Hand wash only. Fasten all closures. Do not wring. Reshape while damp and lay flat to dry.

name: Good Girl Glow Massage Oil
shortDescription: Silky smooth massage oil with notes of vanilla and white peach.
description: This skin-nourishing massage oil glides effortlessly and absorbs beautifully, leaving skin soft and lightly fragranced. Formulated with natural oils including sweet almond, jojoba, and vitamin E. The sweet, flirty scent is subtle yet memorable.
careNotes: Store in cool, dry place. For external use only. Patch test recommended.

name: Midnight Ember Massage Candle
shortDescription: Warm, sensual amber and dark musk. Melts into luxurious massage oil.
description: This sophisticated massage candle combines ambiance with function. As it burns, the wax melts into a warm, skin-safe massage oil with notes of dark amber, sandalwood, and musk. Crafted from shea butter, coconut oil, and natural soy wax.
careNotes: Burn until wax pools to edges. Test temperature on wrist before use on body. For external use only.

name: Noir Siren Body Oil – Black Fig & Amber
shortDescription: Intoxicating black fig and golden amber in a luxe dry oil.
description: This fast-absorbing dry oil leaves skin luminous without residue. The scent is deep, mysterious, and unforgettable – ripe black fig layered with warm amber and a whisper of cedar. Packaged in a stunning black glass bottle with gold accents.
careNotes: Apply to damp skin after shower. Store away from direct sunlight. For external use only.

name: Low Light Ritual Candle
shortDescription: Soft vanilla and warm sandalwood for setting the mood.
description: Create ambiance with this clean-burning soy candle. The gentle scent of vanilla bean and sandalwood fills the room without overwhelming. Perfect for creating intimate atmosphere. 40+ hour burn time.
careNotes: Trim wick to 1/4 inch before each use. Burn until wax pools to edges to prevent tunneling.

name: Warm Rush Massage Candle Trio
shortDescription: Three intoxicating scents: Spiced Honey, Dark Rose, Wild Amber.
description: Experience three distinct moods with this curated set of massage candles. Each 4oz tin melts into skin-safe massage oil. Spiced Honey is warm and inviting, Dark Rose is bold and romantic, Wild Amber is deep and mysterious. Perfect for exploration or variety.
careNotes: Test temperature before use. Burn until wax pools to edges. For external use only.

name: Late Check-Out Conversation Cards
shortDescription: Thoughtfully designed conversation prompts for connection and curiosity.
description: 52 beautifully designed cards featuring questions, prompts, and scenarios to deepen intimacy and spark playful conversation. Ranges from sweet and curious to bold and daring. Perfect for couples exploring together or long-time partners seeking new connection.
careNotes: Keep in box when not in use. Handle with clean, dry hands.

name: Blindfold & Soft Restraints Set
shortDescription: Luxe satin blindfold with adjustable soft restraints.
description: Explore sensory play with this beginner-friendly set. Features a padded satin blindfold and matching adjustable wrist restraints with velcro closures. Soft, comfortable, and easily removable for comfort and safety. Includes discreet storage pouch.
careNotes: Machine wash cold, gentle cycle. Air dry. Do not bleach or iron.

name: Noir Siren Silk Tie
shortDescription: 100% pure silk tie in midnight black with gold embroidery.
description: This stunning silk tie is both elegant accessory and intimate tool. Crafted from the finest pure silk with delicate gold embroidery along the edges. Long enough to be versatile, soft enough to be gentle. Comes in a luxury gift box.
careNotes: Dry clean only or hand wash in cold water with silk detergent. Do not wring.

name: Barely Proper Starter Kit
shortDescription: The perfect introduction: beginner toy, massage oil, and candle.
description: Start your journey with confidence. This thoughtfully curated kit includes the Soft Focus Mini Massager, Good Girl Glow Massage Oil, and Low Light Ritual Candle. Everything you need to explore intimacy at your own pace, beautifully packaged in a discreet gift box.
careNotes: See individual product care instructions.

name: Pretty Ruthless Weekend Kit
shortDescription: Bold weekend essentials: advanced toy, strappy lingerie, and accessories.
description: Elevate your weekend with this daring collection. Includes the After Hours Pulse, Blindfold & Soft Restraints Set, and the Midnight Ember Massage Candle. For those ready to explore with confidence and style.
careNotes: See individual product care instructions.

name: Femme Obscura Luxe Box
shortDescription: The ultimate in luxury: premium toy, body oil, and noir packaging.
description: Experience sophistication at its finest. This exclusive collection features the Midnight Signal Rechargeable Wand, Noir Siren Body Oil, and the Femme Obscura Mesh Panel Bodysuit. Arrives in stunning noir packaging with gold foil details.
careNotes: See individual product care instructions. Premium packaging is reusable for storage.

name: Coaxx Couples Box – Monthly
shortDescription: Monthly curated box for adventurous couples: 3-5 items delivered to your door.
description: Discover something new every month with our curated subscription box. Each box contains 3-5 items thoughtfully selected to inspire connection and exploration. Themes rotate monthly between romantic, playful, and bold. Cancel anytime.
themeNotes: Themes rotate monthly: Romantic, Playful, Bold. Each box is a surprise!
careNotes: Care instructions included with each item in the box.

name: Noir Siren Luxe Quarterly Box
shortDescription: Premium quarterly box featuring high-end items and exclusive pieces.
description: Elevate your collection with our most luxurious subscription. Delivered quarterly, each box features 4-6 premium items including exclusive products not available for individual purchase. Curated for the connoisseur. Cancel anytime.
themeNotes: Each quarter features a sophisticated theme. Exclusive items only available in this box.
careNotes: Premium care instructions and storage recommendations included with each box.
